name: Devil Within Us Mobile
description:
Main Features 
  • Two Endings.
  • Your choices matter.
  • Battle System With Skills.
  • The story doesn't screw the player over with things they have no effect over.
  • Trainers that can teach you skills and level up your stats.
My Vision

This game is currently early access meaning the game isn't completely done but the 30+ minutes on one play through are fully made and shouldn't be too buggy. In the future i wish to double the amount of content the game has but, I want to take a break for a bit from this game because I've been working on it sunrise to sundown every day for a month. Your input could easily change the story or add a new mechanic, 

if your interested in working on music/art for the game contact me on discord : @ItBeLikeDat#9627 

Do you want to play on PC: http://bit.ly/2KgntKt
